entries.arrived_at_loc: You are at your assigned sector. If they come your way, you need to hold them off for five minutes!
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.first_attack: I'm sorry pilot but they seemed to have picked your route. I hope you're as good as they say.
entries.found_loc: You have been assigned this location, proceed to there and keep your eyes open for hostiles.
entries.mission_complete: Nym Mining Pilot: < We're safe pilot. Good job, we owe you a big one! >
entries.outofrange: Worvog Arkon: < You're too far from your position, the Black Sun will sneak by you! >
entries.outofrange_failed: Nym Mining Pilot: < They are all over us! We're taking heavy casaulties! We need he.. >
entries.quest_defendpoint_d: Stay close to these coordinates and defeat any enemy ship that come within distance, don't let any slip past you before Nym's mining vessels have evacuated.
entries.quest_location_d: This area of the Dathomir system is relatively free from hostile encounters but the Black Sun is mounting a large scale attack and they may already be in the area when you arrive.
entries.quest_reachpoint_d: This is your assigned area to defend. Keep your eye out for any hostile ships.
entries.split_quest_alert: Worvog Arkon: < Thanks to your efforts, the Black Sun is vulnerable. Lets exploit that, stand by for orders. >
entries.title: Dathomir system: Stop the Black Sun from reaching mining vessels.
entries.title_d: Nym has asked us to help some of his mining vessels in the Dathomir system escape an oncoming Black Sun attack. Several Alliance and Nym fighters have been stationed at different spots through out the nearby area to cover any incoming Black Sun ships from reaching the mining vessels while they evacuate.
entries.trans_update: Tactical Computer: < %DI percent of friendly fleet has moved to safety. >
entries.transmission_received: Tactical Computer: < 100 percent of friendly fleet has moved to safety. >
entries.transmission_start: Nym Mining Pilot: < We are beginning to move now, we need about five minutes to get to safety. >
